meleeWeapons.name: Disk of Tzeentch's Teeth and Horns

abilities.name: Aviarch
abilities.desc:
The leader of this unit is **Aviarch**. Aviarch **makes 3** attacks
            rather **2** with its **Tzeentchian Spear**.

abilities.name: Discs of Tzeenth
abilities.desc:
If unit of Tzaangor Enlightened is on top of the disk it
            grants them **move of 16" and the Teeth and Horns attack**. Also they **can fly**
            and have **wounds** characteristic of **4 instead of 3**. Also they gain **DEMON** keyword.

abilities.name: Bubbling Stream of Secrets
abilities.desc:
If an enemy unit within 9" of any Tzaangor Enlightened models fails a 
            battleshock test, one additional model flees.

abilities.name: Guided by the Past
abilities.desc:
You can re-roll all failed hit and wound rolls for a unit of Tzaangor
            Enligtened if there are any enemy units within 3" of them that have already attacked
            this phase.

abilities.name: Preternatural Enhancement
abilities.desc:
If this unit is within 9" of a Tzaangor Shaman at the start of the combat phase,
            add 1 to all hit rolls you make for their Tzeentchian Spear and Vicious Beak attacks.
